current16:53, 11 July 2017500 × 500 (53 KB)WikiDan61 (talk | contribs)Color correction. All images of actual Vatican City flags show the "gold" in the keys and tiara rendered in the same hue as the gold/yellow band of the flag, as well as a red opening at the bottom of the tiara.
